statements: SELECT * FROM weather_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM weather_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT station_id, sensor_type, humidity FROM weather_sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_sensor_data WHERE humidity < 60 AND temperature > 20;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM weather_sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT sensor_id, station_id, sensor_type, temperature, humidity FROM weather_sensor_data
SELECT * FROM weather_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM weather_sensor_data WHERE humidity > 70 AND temperature < 30 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT DISTINCT station_id FROM weather_sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60
SELECT station_id, COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_sensors FROM weather_sensor_data GROUP BY station_id HAVING total_sensors > 2
SELECT * FROM WeatherStationData WHERE station_id = 100;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM WeatherStationData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT crop_type, yield_prediction FROM CropYieldPrediction WHERE prediction_date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM WeatherStationData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50;
SELECT station_id, crop_type, yield_prediction FROM CropYieldPrediction WHERE yield_prediction > 1000 ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM WeatherStationData WHERE humidity > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT station_id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherStationData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT station_id, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM WeatherStationData WHERE humidity < 40 AND temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM CropYieldPrediction WHERE crop_type='Corn' ORDER BY prediction_date DESC
SELECT station_id, crop_type, yield_prediction, prediction_date FROM CropYieldPrediction WHERE yield_prediction > 500 ORDER BY yield_prediction DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_station_data;
SELECT station_id, temperature, humidity FROM weather_station_data;
SELECT timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM weather_station_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT crop_type, predicted_yield FROM crop_yield_prediction WHERE prediction_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT region, average_temperature, analysis_date FROM climate_analysis ORDER BY average_temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_station_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT station_id, temperature, humidity FROM weather_station_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity > 80;
SELECT region, average_temperature, average_humidity FROM climate_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT crop_type, predicted_yield FROM crop_yield_prediction ORDER BY predicted_yield DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, station_id, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_station_data WHERE wind_speed > 10 AND timestamp >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM weather_station;
SELECT station_name, location FROM weather_station ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield WHERE forecasted_yield > yield_amount;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM crop_sensor ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT station_name, location FROM weather_station WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, data FROM crop_sensor JOIN crop_yield ON crop_sensor.yield_id = crop_yield.yield_id WHERE crop_yield.crop_name = 'Corn' AND sensor_type = 'humidity_sensor';
SELECT MAX(yield_amount) AS max_yield FROM crop_yield;

SELECT station_name, temperature, humidity FROM weather_station JOIN climate_data ON weather_station.station_id = climate_data.station_id WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 80 ORDER BY station_name ASC, temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE humidity > 75 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_forecast WHERE temperature < 25 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT location, region, altitude FROM weather_station WHERE altitude BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT crop_name, season, expected_yield FROM crop_yield WHERE actual_yield > expected_yield;
SELECT * FROM soil_data WHERE ph_level < 6.5 ORDER BY ph_level DESC, mineral_content ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM weather_station WHERE region = 'Mountain' ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_station WHERE altitude > 500 ORDER BY location ASC;

SELECT weather_station.location, climate_data.humidity, climate_data.pressure FROM weather_station JOIN climate_data ON weather_station.weather_station_id = climate_data.weather_station_id WHERE climate_data.date = '2022-10-15' ORDER BY climate_data.pressure DESC;
SELECT crop_name, season, expected_yield FROM crop_yield WHERE actual_yield > expected_yield ORDER BY actual_yield DESC;
SELECT location, soil_type, ph_level FROM soil_data WHERE mineral_content > 5.0 ORDER BY location ASC;
